page.title: 16Caring for People.
page.content: {Abbots Worthy Rectory}in Park Lane is now a home for seriously handicapped children ages ranging from 3 to 19. It has twelve children looked after by 22 staff and is run by Winchester Health Authority. {Headbourne Worthy House,}with its modern cottages and flats set in 16 acres of landscaped gardens, is the ideal solution to the problem of retirement. The aim is to ensure that residents can live independent lives with their own possessions. {Merridales}is a home for handicapped children ages ranging 10 _ 19 years. At present there are 16 resident children who attend schools during the day. {Cornerways}is a home for the elderly. The primary school performs a christmas concert there each year.
